LoanApplication.title: Loan Application
LoanApplication.description: Represents a loan application submitted by a user.

fullName.description: The full name of the applicant.

email.description: The email address of the applicant.

phoneNumber.description: The phone number of the applicant.

typeOfService.description: The type of service requested (Loan, Investment, Membership).

amountRequested.description: The amount requested for the loan.

employmentType.description: The employment type of the applicant.

uploadedDocumentUrl.description: URL of the uploaded user document (Payslip, ID, Collateral).

preferredContactMethod.description: The preferred contact method of the applicant (Phone/Email).

submissionDate.description: Date and time when the loan application was submitted.

guarantorEmploymentPlace.description: Place of employment of the guarantor.

guarantorRelationship.description: Relationship of the guarantor to the borrower.

guarantorIdUrl.description: URL of the uploaded guarantor ID.

Customer.title: Customer
Customer.description: Represents a customer or borrower in the system.

name.description: The full name of the customer.

email.description: The email address of the customer.

phone.description: The phone number of the customer.

bvn.description: The Bank Verification Number of the customer.

createdAt.description: The date the customer was created.

/loanApplications/{loanApplicationId}.description: Stores all loan applications submitted through the public form.
